articles.author: Landon Mion
articles.title: UPDATE: CDC Deletes Guidance Urging Americans to Open Windows, Use Fans for Indoor Holiday Gatherings - Townhall
articles.description: Update: An earlier version of this story was based on guidance that was mistakenly posted Monday by the CDC. This story was updated at 8:00 p.m. to reflect the removal
